label: Outer Bicep
short_description: The outer portion responsible for the bicep "peak."

label: Inner Bicep
short_description: The inner portion that adds width to the arm.

label: Inner Tricep
short_description: The largest tricep head, key for overall arm mass.

label: Outer Tricep
short_description: Responsible for the "horseshoe" look on the side.

label: Deep Tricep
short_description: Deep muscle visible near the elbow on the inner side.

label: Upper Traps
short_description: Fibers that elevate the scapula and support the neck.

label: Lower Traps
short_description: Lower fibers that depress and stabilize the scapula.

label: Inner Quad
short_description: The teardrop-shaped muscle just above the knee.

label: Outer Quad
short_description: The large muscle on the outside of the thigh.

label: Mid Quad
short_description: The middle quad muscle that also crosses the hip.

label: Outer Hamstring
short_description: The outer hamstring head responsible for knee flexion.

label: Inner Hamstring
short_description: The inner hamstring portion used for leg rotation.

label: Upper Abs
short_description: The upper segments of the rectus abdominis.

label: Lower Abs
short_description: The segments below the navel, often hardest to define.

label: Middle Abs
short_description: The central segments of the rectus abdominis.

label: Upper Obliques
short_description: The portion of the obliques near the rib cage.

label: Lower Obliques
short_description: The portion near the hip bones.

label: Internal Obliques
short_description: Deep muscle fibers beneath the surface.

label: Inner Calf
short_description: The inner part of the upper calf.

label: Outer Calf
short_description: The outer part of the upper calf.

label: Lower Calf
short_description: The muscle tucked under the gastroc.

label: Top Forearm
short_description: Muscles on the back of the forearm.

label: Bottom Forearm
short_description: Muscles on the palm side of the forearm.

label: Outer Forearm
short_description: Large muscle on the thumb-side.
